languages.text: {n}Необъяснимое напряжение охватило не только Вигдис, но, кажется, всех офицеров. Замерев, они косят взглядами в вашу сторону.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Необъяснимое напряжение охватило не только Вигдис, но, кажется, всех офицеров. Замерев, они косят взглядами в вашу сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also the rest of the officers. They freeze, their eyes squinting in your direction.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also the rest of the officers. They freeze, their eyes squinting in your direction.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}
{n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une tension inexplicable semble s'être emparée de Vigdis et des autres officiers. Ils restent figés, les yeux rivés sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une tension inexplicable semble s'être emparée de Vigdis et des autres officiers. Ils restent figés, les yeux rivés sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯身上流露着某种莫名其妙的紧张感，其他军官也同样如此。他们一动不动地站着，眼睛紧盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯身上流露着某种莫名其妙的紧张感，其他军官也同样如此。他们一动不动地站着，眼睛紧盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine unerklärliche Anspannung hat nicht nur Vigdis ergriffen, sondern offenbar auch die übrigen Offiziere. Sie stehen wie versteinert da, die Blicke starr auf dich gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unerklärliche Anspannung hat nicht nur Vigdis ergriffen, sondern offenbar auch die übrigen Offiziere. Sie stehen wie versteinert da, die Blicke starr auf dich gerichtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, además del resto de los oficiales, parecen mostrar una inexplicable tensión. Se han quedado paralizados mirándote fijamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, además del resto de los oficiales, parecen mostrar una inexplicable tensión. Se han quedado paralizados mirándote fijamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスだけでなく、他の士官たちにも不可解な緊張感が広がっている。彼らは凍りついたように立ちすくみ、その目はあなたに釘付けになっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスだけでなく、他の士官たちにも不可解な緊張感が広がっている。彼らは凍りついたように立ちすくみ、その目はあなたに釘付けになっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anlaşılması güç bir gerilim yalnızca Vigdis'i değil, görünüşe göre tüm subayları pençesine almış. Donmuş ve bakışlarını sana kenetlemiş hâldeler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An inexplicable tension has gripped not only Vigdis, but also seemingly the rest of the officers. They stand frozen, their eyes glued to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Anlaşılması güç bir gerilim yalnızca Vigdis'i değil, görünüşe göre tüm subayları pençesine almış. Donmuş ve bakışlarını sana kenetlemiş hâldeler.{/n}
